thread.title: ​Wild about Harry Connick Jr.

title: ​Wild about Harry Connick Jr.
text: ‘Harry Potter' Epic Play Features Sequel About Harry's Son 00:51 The harry play “Harry Potter and the Cursed Child,” will be a two-part epic set 19 years after J.K. Rowling’s seventh Potter novel, “Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows,”. The play will feature a storyline that revolves around an adult Harry and his youngest son, Albus. This is also the... Recent related news From movies and TV to recordings and live concerts, music lovers are just wild about Harry Connick Jr. and nowhere more so than in his hometown of New Orleans CBS News 1 hour ago - Front Page You Might Like
